attributes.action: Stop the proposed waste management site on Brunel Industrial Estate, Newton Abbot
attributes.additional_details: Devon County Council have included Brunel Industrial Estate as a possible site for a waste management facilty. The area is already heavily populated by a number of commercial sites and residential properties which have been there for over 100 years. Please sign this petition and put a stop to this ridiculous proposal which will have a significant impact on the community with increased traffic, disgusting smells and unsightly rubbish.
